review:
movie has hilarious comedy scenes which make you laugh. but the movie looses grip in second half and you just try to stay away from movie in last 30 minutes as story gets boring due to unwanted family drama. but for the normal audience the movie is treat and a must watch.
songs in the first half were also good and well presented.
rating:7/10.

the best comedy india has ever made, clever, witty and with a slice of life.it remans true to the genre, even with such a simplistic story, and little moments between the dialogue you can spot rajpal yadav giving the best comical expressions. no joke is bunt or out of place and the one liners are just awesome.

rajpal yadav, paresh rawal and om puri will forever remain the legends of indian cinema. such brilliant acting performances. shahid is probably the most versatile actor in bollywood. romance and chemistry between shahid and kareena fall short of expectations, but overall the movie is definitely a must watch.

its a movie that i have watch a number of times that is uncountable. the blend of sacrifices, helplessness and purity in god is perfectly depicted through this film. 
a picture that has moral values, divine and and stomach aching comedy, has everything that a movie should have.

the true  conclusion of this movie is an unwanted man will became a good achievable person in his life the future will changes all the problems in life and finally lam really very happy to saw this movie
one of the best comedy movie. actors acting were truely good. storyline direction was very good. dialogues were fabulous . really fantastic movie.
